description:
A high school boy that loves small, cute things starts working at the family restaurant, Wagnaria, a nest of abnormal fruitcakes. Just as he is acclimating to his new environment, he meets a young woman who will alter his fate for good.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Welcome to Wagnaria: Takanashi Goes to Work.
ワグナリアへようこそ♪小鳥遊, 働く.
